website_summaries.verdict: Nothing short of enchanting, this option is a bit pricey, but the quality and craftsmanship is excellent.
pros: Quality construction is built to last and even comes with a patch kit for repairs
Large design floats most cans, cups, and bottles
A huge hit with unicorn lovers of all ages
cons: Expensive for a single drink holder and might still tip over with taller bottles

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it!!!!! I have not tried it out on the pool yet but the size is perfect. I also got it with the intention to fit my hamster in it for pictures and the size was perfect. I have the huge floaty so the tiny cup holder seemed great to add to the collection. I wish it were cheaper though and that they come in a pack option to share with friends on a pool day. Is an exact mini version of the huge floaty and it comes with a patch and instructions in case it gets damaged. Super fast to inflate and deflate.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Fernandez-Baca

customer_reviews.title: #floaty UNICORN Making the Universe SPARKLE!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the floaty Unicorns! Our surfing dog, Carson, loves to have them as his companions in his surfing competition. They are colorful props on his board and act as training devices. The cupholder is perfect to hold his treats. And, they bring joy and smiles to spectators. #floaty
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Much more than a cup holder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a whim for my Dads 70th Birthday swim party and had no clue it would be the best gift I’ve ever gotten him. Their dog follows it around the pool. after the first month, they named him Eduardo. They absolutely love watching Eduardo with all his joy float happily around the pool
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Debating
customer_reviews.text: Small and I highly doubt it will float in the pool with a drink in it- but it’s cute it’s ok if it doesn’t. I’ll update review when we really test it out
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Much better quality than it's competitors
customer_reviews.text: I've used some of the other inflatable animal drink holders and this one is legit. It holds a heavy, full beer can. Some of the others I have purchased tip over with a full drink. I also use these to put my cell phone, tv remote and sunscreen in!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret P.

customer_reviews.title: A double-rainbow of awesomeness...
customer_reviews.text: Floats & looks magical, but I think it's been drinking my beer........
customer_reviews.author: MOsammy

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it's all love with me and this brilliant floaty (
customer_reviews.text: Works well with 12oz cans or similar sized glasses; not such much with taller mugs or glasses. Otherwise it's all love with me and this brilliant floaty (:
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Everyone at the pool loves my floaty :) works great for cans, not really for anything else. Much higher quality than other floaties I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Candice H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome koozie. bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Awesome koozie. bigger than expected, but will be great for the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Dan L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Fortnite costume
customer_reviews.text: Used this to make a Fortnite costume. It was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: we did blow one up and it is super cute!
customer_reviews.text: It's winter so I haven't had a chance to actually use these yet in our pool. However, we did blow one up and it is super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect arrived on time even with my last minute 2 day shipping edit. Cant wait to gift it!
customer_reviews.author: StefBrown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for a friend who loves unicorns and it was a hit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karra M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand of quality blow up pool toys
customer_reviews.text: Cute cup holder and fast shipping!! Love this brand of quality blow up pool toys.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: 🦄💖🦄💖🦄💖🦄💖
customer_reviews.text: This 🦄 cup holder is the cutest thing ever. I loooove it and great quality. Super happy!! 🦄🦄🦄🦄🦄🦄🦄🦄
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute floaty and it really does hold/float your drinking cup.
customer_reviews.author: Tara B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: OMG I LOVE IT!! Wish I had the giant raft to match! Great quality and so cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Gunaca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly as a miniature boat for my bird. She loves it and the thick material was able to withstand her sharp little talons.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The material is super high quality and the colors are bright!
customer_reviews.author: Jetpack

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!!! I took my unicorn with me to Jamaica for my honeymoon and it was great for holding ny drinks for me while at the pool!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this little FLOATY for the tub
customer_reviews.text: Love this little FLOATY for the tub. It holds my chocolate milk swimmingly. I would like to float some hot tea but do not know how the plastic will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: SimpleFarmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best drink float around. Holds just about any size drink or bottle. Travels easily too.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: but it's super cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Looked bigger in the picture to me, but it's super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: cute and easy to inflate - a little tippy but what do you expect - it's cheap but fun
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Shipped fast. Only downfall is my Yeti cup doesnt ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast. Only downfall is my Yeti cup doesnt seem to want to fit. Otherwise cute for jolding a can or nottle beverage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He got it after a crappy day at work and it made him smile
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a friend as a joke. He got it after a crappy day at work and it made him smile 10/10
customer_reviews.author: just jeff

customer_reviews.title: Hedgehog Approved
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely floaty for hedgehogs who hate baths.
customer_reviews.author: Care

customer_reviews.title: I love my little guy
customer_reviews.text: Buy it!!! I love my little guy, totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a coffee holder on my work desk because I spill too often. It works perfectly for that. And it's so adorable too! The quality is good, and comes with a repair patch. I was worried at first about the creases on the surface after I first inflated it (PFA the photo). But after some days they start to get lighter and disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: So my kids were very excited to get this little cup holder floaty. They want their dolls to swim with them, so this works great. It is pretty small, as described. But they were very happy with it. It arrived fast from the seller and was packaged very well. Inflated easily no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Theirishwhistle

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! It's super cute and fits cans perfectly. Floats great and is very sturdy. Just in case it gets a hole in it, it comes with a patch kit which is nice. This would make a great gift for any unicorn lover!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: My Friend Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: My friend is a unicorn nut and she loved this! Can't really say how well it works, but the cuteness of it makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Grid

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cup holder floatie
customer_reviews.text: Very cute cup holder for the pool. It's great for a can or a cup with a lid.
customer_reviews.author: L. Flax

customer_reviews.title: Great pool drink holder!
customer_reviews.text: cutest thing ever...and you can put a cord around his neck to tie to your float
customer_reviews.author: Chandler
